comments.content: That is [Ziggurat](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516151122/http:/typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100028) from Hoefler & Frere-Jones. The clues? The c with the overbite, the flat bottomed g, and the b with the angled notch.

TIffany. :) I'd recognize those Type Camp descriptions anywhere!

I found both of these lovely beasts on my machine, to my delight.

thanks people!

sorry, you guys are right... i didn't check carefully enough...

:-)

if you like slabs, have you seen Facebuster?

i love it!

[http://www.typetrust.com/font/facebuster](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516151122/http:/www.typetrust.com/font/facebuster "http://www.typetrust.com/font/facebuster")
